Join Us

Do you have what it takes to join Reign of Iron?

Requirements

PvP

K/D

1.00

KDA

1.25

KA/D

1.50

PvE

K/D

15.0

Raid Clears

10

Fulfilling any one of the above criteria grants eligibility for consideration for Reign of Iron.

Membership applications will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis by CanisMajoris and Kuro.

Note: only applications submitted through reignofiron.org will be considered. Applications sent directly through Bungie will not be evaluated.
